doc.title: programming
doc.description: This part is about how to program

example1.title: {{0}}Home page code example
example1.annotation1: Determine whether it is the same primary domain name. If not, return {{0}} and no longer execute.
example1.annotation2: Determine whether it is {{0}} or the homepage of the channel. Its path starts with the @ symbol. If so, return {{1}}.
example1.annotation3: Determine whether it is a video page. Its path starts with /watch. If so, {{0}} will be returned.
example1.annotation4: Determine whether it is a short video page. Its path starts with /shorts/. If so, {{0}} will be returned.
